function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection and analysis of environmental covariates for each trail segment may lead to exposure to outdoor contaminants and pathogens.","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to infectious diseases for researchers and field workers.","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment, vaccination where applicable, and adherence to proper hygiene practices during fieldwork.","Technologies":"GIS mapping, satellite imagery, and spatial analysis tools for remote data collection.","People":"Researchers, field workers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Use of DSM and DTM data provided by the Norwegian Mapping Authority may lead to potential data privacy and security risks if not handled appropriately.","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive geographical data of Oslo municipality.","Mitigation":"Strict data access controls, encryption of sensitive data, and adherence to data protection regulations.","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, and access control mechanisms.","People":"Data analysts, GIS specialists, data privacy officers","Owner":"Norwegian Mapping Authority, Oslo municipality"},{"Description":"Utilization of Google Earth Engine (GEE) cloud computing platform may pose data security and privacy risks if adequate safeguards are not implemented.","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive geographical and environmental data stored on the GEE platform.","Mitigation":"Use of secure access controls, data encryption, and regular security audits of the GEE platform.","Technologies":"Cloud security tools, data encryption, multi-factor authentication.","People":"Data analysts, GIS specialists, cloud security experts","Owner":"Google Earth Engine, research institutions"}]}
